text:
I also like Unix pipes.  But I don’t like _requiring_ processes, IPC and serialization.  I do like having the option of these things.

So I just generalize to objects and pass those between filters that … are also objects.

This is a generalization, so if you want to run filters as processes and exchange data via serialized byte streams, that is available as a special case.

But my experience is that it is rarely necessary.

<https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/3359619.3359748>

<https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.1145/3689492.3690052>
